{
  "roleName": "MockUpDeviceLambdaRole",
  "policies": [
    {
      "name": "AWSIoTDataAccess",
      "id": "ANPAJM2KI2UJDR24XPS2K",
      "type": "managed",
      "arn": "arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AWSIoTDataAccess",
      "document": {
        "Version": "2012-10-17",
        "Statement": [
          {
            "Effect": "Allow",
            "Action": [
              "iot:Connect",
              "iot:Publish",
              "iot:Subscribe",
              "iot:Receive",
              "iot:GetThingShadow",
              "iot:UpdateThingShadow",
              "iot:DeleteThingShadow"
            ],
            "Resource": "*"
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole",
      "id": "ANPAJNCQGXC42545SKXIK",
      "type": "managed",
      "arn": "arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/service-role/AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole",
      "document": {
        "Version": "2012-10-17",
        "Statement": [
          {
            "Effect": "Allow",
            "Action": [
              "logs:CreateLogGroup",
              "logs:CreateLogStream",
              "logs:PutLogEvents"
            ],
            "Resource": "*"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  ],
  "resources": {
    "logs": {
      "service": {
        "name": "Amazon CloudWatch Logs",
        "icon": "data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
      },
      "statements": [
        {
          "resource": "*",
          "service": "logs",
          "effect": "Allow",
          "action": "logs:CreateLogGroup",
          "source": {
            "index": "0",
            "policyName": "AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole",
            "policyType": "managed"
          }
        },
        {
          "resource": "*",
          "service": "logs",
          "effect": "Allow",
          "action": "logs:CreateLogStream",
          "source": {
            "index": "0",
            "policyName": "AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole",
            "policyType": "managed"
          }
        },
        {
          "resource": "*",
          "service": "logs",
          "effect": "Allow",
          "action": "logs:PutLogEvents",
          "source": {
            "index": "0",
            "policyName": "AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole",
            "policyType": "managed"
          }
        }
      ]
    },
    "iot": {
      "service": {
        "name": "AWS IoT",
        "icon": "data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
      },
      "statements": [
        {
          "resource": "*",
          "service": "iot",
          "effect": "Allow",
          "action": "iot:Connect",
          "source": {
            "index": "0",
            "policyName": "AWSIoTDataAccess",
            "policyType": "managed"
          }
        },
        {
          "resource": "*",
          "service": "iot",
          "effect": "Allow",
          "action": "iot:Publish",
          "source": {
            "index": "0",
            "policyName": "AWSIoTDataAccess",
            "policyType": "managed"
          }
        },
        {
          "resource": "*",
          "service": "iot",
          "effect": "Allow",
          "action": "iot:Subscribe",
          "source": {
            "index": "0",
            "policyName": "AWSIoTDataAccess",
            "policyType": "managed"
          }
        },
        {
          "resource": "*",
          "service": "iot",
          "effect": "Allow",
          "action": "iot:Receive",
          "source": {
            "index": "0",
            "policyName": "AWSIoTDataAccess",
            "policyType": "managed"
          }
        },
        {
          "resource": "*",
          "service": "iot",
          "effect": "Allow",
          "action": "iot:GetThingShadow",
          "source": {
            "index": "0",
            "policyName": "AWSIoTDataAccess",
            "policyType": "managed"
          }
        },
        {
          "resource": "*",
          "service": "iot",
          "effect": "Allow",
          "action": "iot:UpdateThingShadow",
          "source": {
            "index": "0",
            "policyName": "AWSIoTDataAccess",
            "policyType": "managed"
          }
        },
        {
          "resource": "*",
          "service": "iot",
          "effect": "Allow",
          "action": "iot:DeleteThingShadow",
          "source": {
            "index": "0",
            "policyName": "AWSIoTDataAccess",
            "policyType": "managed"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "trustedEntities": [
    "lambda.amazonaws.com"
  ]
}
